dialogue: The IT Guy fixed the coffee machine for me, so he should be next.

speakerName: Free Use Intern will continue in Chapter 2

dialogue: To show your support, help us, get the next chapter out as quickly as possible, and let Quinn start using his friend, visit patreon.com/pan or subscribestar.adult/pan
Our supporters get previews of upcoming art, early access to new releases, and votes on which content is included in the game.
In the meantime, why not try to unlock the best Chapter 1 ending?
